title: Indiana Police Announce Arrest in the 2017 Murders of 2 Girls in Delphi
description: Liberty German and Abigail Williams were killed on a hike in northern Indiana. On Monday, the police said a man had been charged.
dc:creator: Christine Hauser and Derrick Bryson Taylor
media:description: Indiana State Police Superintendent Douglas Carter on Monday announced an arrest in the 2017 killings of two girls in Delphi, Ind.
